channel.title: Comments on: North Pole
channel.description: New Home of Reddit Soccer Streams

item.title: By: John Black
item.dc:creator: John Black
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://footybite.vercel.app/north-pole/#comment-12">Daniel</a>.
Quisque dui ex, sagittis vitae faucibus ut, consectetur et metus. Aliquam iaculis imperdiet ligula, rhoncus convallis turpis.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Daniel.

Quisque dui ex, sagittis vitae faucibus ut, consectetur et metus. Aliquam iaculis imperdiet ligula, rhoncus convallis turpis.

item.title: By: Mark Smith
item.dc:creator: Mark Smith
item.description: Donec auctor ex a laoreet egestas. Donec tempor porttitor neque, vel tincidunt metus congue eget. Mauris non maximus nisi.
item.content:encoded: Donec auctor ex a laoreet egestas. Donec tempor porttitor neque, vel tincidunt metus congue eget. Mauris non maximus nisi.

item.title: By: Jennis Blix
item.dc:creator: Jennis Blix
item.description: Sed efficitur congue dolor, et rhoncus ipsum rutrum nec. Ut ac mollis risus, bibendum molestie tortor. Fusce magna dui, pharetra eget pellentesque vehicula, consequat vel nisl.
item.content:encoded: Sed efficitur congue dolor, et rhoncus ipsum rutrum nec. Ut ac mollis risus, bibendum molestie tortor. Fusce magna dui, pharetra eget pellentesque vehicula, consequat vel nisl.

item.title: By: Daniel
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: Nulla laoreet vestibulum turpis non finibus. Proin interdum a tortor sit amet mollis.
item.content:encoded: Nulla laoreet vestibulum turpis non finibus. Proin interdum a tortor sit amet mollis.
